name: .YCHAT File Extension
summary: Learn about .YCHAT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Log file created by Yahoo! Messenger for Mac, an online chatting application; contains a log of the messages sent back and forth; saved with the current date and the contact in the filename; can be used for reviewing the conversation history.

content: YCHAT files are saved to the following directory in Mac: [user]/​Library/​Application Support/​Yahoo! Messenger/​Logs/​.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
